QuestData.Title: Grave Circumstances
QuestData.Description: The Court of Bones crawls with mogu forces. Endlessly do they perform their rituals of lightning and thunder.$B$BIf our mission to take this island is to succeed, then we cannot allow them to hold such a strategic position.$B$BThey must be eliminated.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Shan'ze Gravekeepers, Shan'ze Soulrippers, or Shan'ze Thundercallers.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. You have dealt the mogu a blow that they shall not easily forget.

Objectives.Objective: Shan'ze mogu slain at the Court of Bones
